name: Rafiq Hasan
quote: Running isn't just a sport, it's my therapy. That's why here I am

name: Nusrat Jahan
quote: Every step takes me closer to my strongest self.

name: Tanvir Ahmed
quote: The road may be long, but so is my will. I will finish

name: Maliha Rahman
quote: Breathe. Believe. Run. Repeat til the finish line

name: Sabbir Khan
quote: Pain is temporary. Pride is forever. Trust Yourself
